channel.title: Snippets on Davor Badrov
channel.description: Recent content in Snippets on Davor Badrov

item.title: Nested SELECT query | Snippets
item.author: dev.davor.badrov@gmail.com (davor badrov)
item.description: How to use inner select query in SQL. SELECT t.date , COUNT(*) AS player_count FROM ( SELECT DATE(MIN(`date`)) AS date FROM player_playtime GROUP BY player_name ) AS t GROUP BY t.date DESC LIMIT 60 ;

item.title: SQL - Find duplicate values | Snippets
item.author: dev.davor.badrov@gmail.com (davor badrov)
item.description: Find multiple entries inside a table for given values. This example return users which share their email with other users. SELECT name, email, COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY name, email HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
